Simulate multivariate functional data

Source: R/00_mfd.R
data_sim_mfd.Rd

Simulate random coefficients and create a multivariate functional data object of class `mfd`.

data_sim_mfd(nobs = 5, nbasis = 5, nvar = 2, seed)

Arguments

nobs

Number of functional observations to be simulated.

nbasis

Number of basis functions.

nvar

Number of functional covariates.

seed

Deprecated: use set.seed() before calling the function for reproducibility.

Value

A simulated object of class `mfd`.

Examples

library(funcharts)
data_sim_mfd()
#> $coefs
#> , , var1
#> 
#>             rep1        rep2       rep3       rep4       rep5
#> [1,] -0.48575736 -1.30266652  1.1957618  0.5419005 -0.5416000
#> [2,] -0.93425402  0.83580539  0.3947512  0.7324978  0.5060179
#> [3,] -0.05521087  1.08113553 -1.1517185  1.1035481 -0.1391716
#> [4,] -0.84207650 -0.03207729  0.1206240 -0.8253671  0.8771230
#> [5,] -0.68074370  0.50846467  1.4050977  1.7739599 -0.5596250
#> 
#> , , var2
#> 
#>              rep1       rep2        rep3        rep4       rep5

#> [3,] -0.001468252 -0.1669876 -0.47726690 -0.71182742  1.9796596
#> [4,]  0.841972670 -0.9192063  0.07784522 -1.06549368 -1.2943577
#> [5,] -0.772100526  0.8522608  0.85275642  0.62696643  0.8762714
